description: This is a market on whether Hikaru Nakamura will draw 3 or more times during his May 24 FTX Crypto Cup preliminary games. The market will resolve to “Yes” if Hikaru Nakamura draws 3 or more times during his May 24 FTX Crypto Cup preliminary games and “No” otherwise. He is scheduled to play 5 games on May 24. If any of these games are postponed to a day before May 31, 2021, they will be considered for market resolution. If any of these games are postponed to a day after May 31, 2021 or cancelled altogether, they will not be considered for market resolution. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
